name: PARADISE
detailed_description:
This game is a FPS game.
Operations differ in the real world and in Paradise virtual space.
The player who is private detective is asked to investigate Paradise Corporation by a police detective.
He decided to go to the place of the first customer of Paradise Corporation.
(Player will be a undercover detective.)

In the real world, player mainly explores.
Player explores the true purpose of the Paradise.
Walk: W, A, S, D
Run: Shift key
Zoom: Right Click
Inventory: I
Interact: E
Jump: Space Key
To bring up the Pause menu, press the ESC key.

In the virtual world of Paradise, player mainly fights.
Every time you plug into the paradise system, you may feel a strange sensation in the virtual world of Paradise.

Walk: W, A, S, D
Run: Shift key
Next Weapon: Q, E, Mouse Wheel
Targeting: Right Click
Reload: R
Roll: F
Quick grenade: G
Toggle help display: H
Lean: Z, X
Crouch: C
Jump: Space Key
Turn off the mouse cursor: Right Click
To bring up the Pause menu, press the ESC key.
To skip the cut scene, press the space key.

There are few conversation scenes, but this game emphasizes on atmosphere.
Select the language on the first menu screen. You can read the contents and the key operation explanation of the game.
When the "PLAY" button is pressed, the screen becomes full screen and the game starts.
The joystick and controller may operate if you set the key assignment by yourself.
All music is original composition.
You need a graphic board on your computer to play this game.
(The game is under development. Image and video uses the one of the middle of the development.)

Previous work is here
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1086490/First_Customer/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7th
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7th or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
